    • Method Detail

      • reduceEntry

        public static SREntry reduceEntry(SREntry sQuery,
                  int iterNum,
                  int[] hitsNum)
        Extract a particular set of hits from a particular iteration of a BlastEntry.
        Parameters:
        sQuery - the source BlastEntry.
        iterNum - the iteration to extract. Zero based value.
        hitsNum - array of hits IDs. Be carefull: these are not zero-based values but the ordering number of hits as assigned by the search engine used to produce the source BlastEntry.

      • getIncrement

        public static int getIncrement(int from,
               int to,
               int length)
        Given the sequence coordinate incremental unit. For internal use only.
        Returns:
        possibles values are 1, -1, 3 or -3/

      • removeHspData

        public static void removeHspData(SROutput output,
                 boolean removeSeq,
                 boolean removeFeatTable)
        Use this method to remove some data from all Hsp contained in a SROutput.
        Parameters:
        removeSeq - if true, hit, query and midline sequences are set to null.
        removeFeatTable - if true, feature tables are removed
